thread.title: Thousands of Syrians Killed in Mass Hangings, Amnesty International Claims - WSJ
thread.title_full: Thousands of Syrians Killed in Mass Hangings, Amnesty International Claims - WSJ

author: Associated Press
title: Thousands of Syrians Killed in Mass Hangings, Amnesty International Claims - WSJ
text:
Thousands of Syrians Killed in Mass Hangings, Amnesty International Claims Report by rights group follows interviews with former detainees, officials, guards and judges Associated Press Updated Feb. 7, 2017 6:27 a.m. ET 
BEIRUT—Syrian authorities have killed as many as 13,000 people—possibly more—since the start of the 2011 uprising in mass hangings at a prison north of Damascus known to detainees as “the slaughterhouse,” Amnesty International said on Tuesday. 
In a new report covering the period from 2011 to 2015, Amnesty said 20 to 50 people were hanged each... To Read the Full Story, Suscribirse o Sign In Most Popular Videos
